extensionDescription.message: Auto scroll web pages with fully adjustable speed.

contextMenuSetSpeed.description: Context menu entry to open popup to set speed.

contextMenuToggleDirection.description: Context menu entry to toggle scrolling direction.

contextMenuOptions.description: Context menu entry to open options tab.

lowerEndReached.message: Lower end of page reached. Toggle direction to scroll the other way.
lowerEndReached.description: Alert to display when starting to scroll although page is already at the lower end.

upperEndReached.message: Upper end of page reached. Toggle direction to scroll the other way.
upperEndReached.description: Alert to display when starting to scroll although page is already at the lower end.

setSpeedPopupText.description: Description of input to set speed. Unit: pixel per second.

optionsActionOnEnd.description: Options text: select action if end is reached.

optionsDelay.description: Options text: Delay (in seconds) at end of scrolling before chosen option is executed.

optionsKeepScrolling.description: Options text: enable/disable if page keeps scrolling on change/reload.

optionsAutomaticallyStart.description: Options text: enable/disable if scrolling starts automatically.

optionsBackgroundScrolling.description: Options text: enable/disable if tabs keep scrolling in the background.
